title: My Portfolio
welcome: Welcome to El Roble Virtual Library

about.text: I am a software engineer and mathematician with experience in backend and frontend development, data science, and mathematical modeling. I specialize in building scalable applications and developing data-driven solutions using React, .Net, C#, Python, SQL, and machine learning. I am passionate about writing clean code and applying advanced analytics to support intelligent decision-making.

developer.title: Developer
developer.content: Here you can see my projects related to web and software development.

projects.title: User Management System
projects.description: Full system with JWT authentication, role-based access and user CRUD using React and .Net.

projects.title: Wine & Liquor E-commerce
projects.description: Online store for wine and liquor sales, with shopping cart and simulated payment process using React.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time metrics visualization with interactive charts. React frontend, Express backend.

projects.title: Blog CMS
projects.description: Blog system with WYSIWYG editor, image upload and post management.

projects.title: Collaborative Tasks App
projects.description: Trello-style app with board-based task management, users and notifications.

projects.title: Booking System
projects.description: App to book appointments with interactive calendar, availability control and notifications.
